   20: 
   21: %%
   22: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Purpose: Verify that it is possible to separately encode 
   24: %%          the action requests list. Do this with all codec's
   25: %%          that supports partial encode.
   26: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: -module(megaco_actions_SUITE).
   28: 
   29: -export([
   30:  	 suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   31:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   33:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   34: 
   35:          pretty_text/1,
   36:          flex_pretty_text/1,
   37:          compact_text/1,
   38:          flex_compact_text/1,
   39:          erl_dist/1, 
   40:          erl_dist_mc/1
   41:         ]).
   42: 
   43: -include_lib("megaco/include/megaco.hrl").
   44: -include_lib("megaco/include/megaco_message_v1.hrl").
   45: -include("megaco_test_lib.hrl").
   46: 
   47: -define(TEST_VERBOSITY, debug).
   48: -define(MGC_VERBOSITY,  debug).
   49: -define(MG_VERBOSITY,   debug).
   50: 
   51: -define(LOAD_COUNTER_START, 10).
   52: -define(A4444, ["11111111", "00000000", "00000000"]).
   53: -define(A4445, ["11111111", "00000000", "11111111"]).
   54: -define(A5555, ["11111111", "11111111", "00000000"]).
   55: -define(A5556, ["11111111", "11111111", "11111111"]).
   56: 
   57: -define(MGC_START(Pid, Mid, ET, Verb), 
   58: 	megaco_test_mgc:start(Pid, Mid, ET, Verb)).
   59: -define(MGC_STOP(Pid),          megaco_test_mgc:stop(Pid)).
   60: -define(MGC_GET_STATS(Pid, No), megaco_test_mgc:get_stats(Pid, No)).
   61: -define(MGC_RESET_STATS(Pid),   megaco_test_mgc:reset_stats(Pid)).
   62: -define(MGC_REQ_DISC(Pid,To),   megaco_test_mgc:request_discard(Pid,To)).
   63: -define(MGC_REQ_PEND(Pid,To),   megaco_test_mgc:request_pending(Pid,To)).
   64: -define(MGC_REQ_HAND(Pid),      megaco_test_mgc:request_handle(Pid)).
   65: 
   66: -define(MG_START(Pid, Mid, Codec, EC, Transp, Verb), 
   67: 	megaco_test_mg:start(Pid, Mid, {Codec, EC}, Transp, Verb)).
   68: -define(MG_STOP(Pid),        megaco_test_mg:stop(Pid)).
   69: -define(MG_GET_STATS(Pid),   megaco_test_mg:get_stats(Pid)).
   70: -define(MG_RESET_STATS(Pid), megaco_test_mg:reset_stats(Pid)).
   71: -define(MG_SERV_CHANGE(Pid), megaco_test_mg:service_change(Pid)).
   72: -define(MG_NOTIF_RAR(Pid),   megaco_test_mg:notify_request_and_reply(Pid)).
   73: -define(MG_NOTIF_REQ(Pid),   megaco_test_mg:notify_request(Pid)).
   74: -define(MG_NOTIF_AR(Pid),    megaco_test_mg:await_notify_reply(Pid)).
   75: -define(MG_CANCEL(Pid,R),    megaco_test_mg:cancel_request(Pid,R)).
   76: -define(MG_APPLY_LOAD(Pid,CntStart), megaco_test_mg:apply_load(Pid,CntStart)).
   77: -define(MG_EAR(Pid, Val),    megaco_test_mg:encode_ar_first(Pid, Val)).
   78: 
   79: 
   80: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   81: 
   82: %%======================================================================
   83: %% Common Test interface functions
   84: %%======================================================================
   85: 
   86: suite() -> 
   87:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   88: 
   89: all() -> 
   90:     [
   91:      pretty_text,
   92:      flex_pretty_text,
   93:      compact_text,
   94:      flex_compact_text,
   95:      erl_dist,
   96:      erl_dist_mc
   97:     ].
   98: 
   99: groups() -> 
  100:     [].
  101: 
  102: 
  103: 
  104: %%
  105: %% -----
  106: %%
  107: 
  108: init_per_suite(suite) ->
  109:     [];
  110: init_per_suite(doc) ->
  111:     [];
  112: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  113: 
  114:     ?ANNOUNCE_SUITE_INIT(),
  115: 
  116:     p("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  117:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  118:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  119: 
  120:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  121:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  122:             SKIP;
  123: 
  124:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  125: 
  126:             %% We need a (local) monitor on this node also
  127:             megaco_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  128: 
  129:             p("init_per_suite -> end when"
  130:               "~n      Config: ~p"
  131:               "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config1, erlang:nodes()]),
  132: 
  133:             Config1
  134:     end.
  135: 
  136: end_per_suite(suite) -> [];
  137: end_per_suite(doc) -> [];
  138: end_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  139: 
  140:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  141:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  142:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  143: 
  144:     megaco_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  145:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  146: 
  147:     p("end_per_suite -> end when"
  148:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  149: 
  150:     Config1.
  151: 
  152: 
  153: %%
  154: %% -----
  155: %%
  156: 
  157: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  158:     Config.
  159: 
  160: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  161:     Config.
  162: 
  163: 
  164: 
  165: %%
  166: %% -----
  167: %%
  168: 
  169: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  170:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  171: 
  172:     p("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  173:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  174:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  175: 
  176:     megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  177:     megaco_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  178: 
  179: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  180:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  181: 
  182:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  183:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  184:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  185: 
  186:     p("system events during test: "
  187:       "~n   ~p", [megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  188: 
  189:     megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  190: 
  191: 
  192: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  193: 
  194: mgc_start(Node, ET) ->
  195:     ?MGC_START(Node, {deviceName, "ctrl"}, ET, ?MGC_VERBOSITY).
  196: 
  197: mgc_stop(Mgc) ->
  198:     ?MGC_STOP(Mgc).
  199: 
  200: 
  201: 
  202: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  203: 
  204: pretty_text(suite) ->
  205:     [];
  206: pretty_text(doc) ->
  207:     [];
  208: pretty_text(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  209:     Pre  = fun req_and_rep_pre/0,
  210:     Case = fun(Nodes) -> do_pretty_text(Nodes, Config) end,
  211:     Post = fun req_and_rep_post/1,
  212:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
  213: 
  214: 
  215: do_pretty_text(Nodes, Config) ->
  216:     Codec          = pretty_text,
  217:     Version        = 1, 
  218:     EncodingConfig = [],
  219:     req_and_rep(Nodes, Config, Codec, Version, EncodingConfig).
  220: 
  221: 
  222: flex_pretty_text(suite) ->
  223:     [];
  224: flex_pretty_text(doc) ->
  225:     [];
  226: flex_pretty_text(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  227:     ?SKIP(not_implemented_yet).
  228: 
  229: 
  230: compact_text(suite) ->
  231:     [];
  232: compact_text(doc) ->
  233:     [];
  234: compact_text(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  235:     Pre  = fun req_and_rep_pre/0,
  236:     Case = fun(Nodes) -> do_compact_text(Nodes, Config) end,
  237:     Post = fun req_and_rep_post/1,
  238:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
  239: 
  240: do_compact_text(Nodes, Config) ->
  241:     Codec          = compact_text,
  242:     Version        = 1, 
  243:     EncodingConfig = [],
  244:     req_and_rep(Nodes, Config, Codec, Version, EncodingConfig).
  245: 
  246: 
  247: flex_compact_text(suite) ->
  248:     [];
  249: flex_compact_text(doc) ->
  250:     [];
  251: flex_compact_text(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  252:     ?SKIP(not_implemented_yet).
  253: 
  254: 
  255: erl_dist(suite) ->
  256:     [];
  257: erl_dist(doc) ->
  258:     [];
  259: erl_dist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  260:     Pre  = fun req_and_rep_pre/0,
  261:     Case = fun(Nodes) -> do_erl_dist(Nodes, Config) end,
  262:     Post = fun req_and_rep_post/1,
  263:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
  264: 
  265: do_erl_dist(Nodes, Config) ->
  266:     Codec          = erl_dist,
  267:     Version        = 1, 
  268:     EncodingConfig = [],
  269:     req_and_rep(Nodes, Config, Codec, Version, EncodingConfig).
  270: 
  271: 
  272: erl_dist_mc(suite) ->
  273:     [];
  274: erl_dist_mc(doc) ->
  275:     [];
  276: erl_dist_mc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  277:     Pre  = fun req_and_rep_pre/0,
  278:     Case = fun(Nodes) -> do_erl_dist_mc(Nodes, Config) end,
  279:     Post = fun req_and_rep_post/1,
  280:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
  281: 
  282: do_erl_dist_mc(Nodes, Config) ->
  283:     Codec          = erl_dist,
  284:     Version        = 1,
  285:     EncodingConfig = [megaco_compressed],
  286:     req_and_rep(Nodes, Config, Codec, Version, EncodingConfig).
  287: 
  288: 
  289: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  290: 
  291: req_and_rep_pre() ->
  292:     MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
  293:     Mg1Node = make_node_name(mg1),
  294:     Mg2Node = make_node_name(mg2),
  295:     d("req_and_rep_pre -> start nodes: "
  296:       "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
  297:       "~n      Mg1Node: ~p"
  298:       "~n      Mg2Node: ~p", 
  299:       [MgcNode, Mg1Node, Mg2Node]),
  300:     Nodes = [MgcNode, Mg1Node, Mg2Node],
  301:     ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  302:     Nodes.
  303: 
  304: req_and_rep_post(Nodes) ->
  305:     d("req_and_rep_post -> stop nodes"),
  306:     ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes)).
  307:     
  308: 
  309: req_and_rep([MgcNode, Mg1Node, Mg2Node],
  310:             Config, Codec, _Version, EC) when is_list(Config) ->
  311: 
  312:     %% Start the MGC and MGs
  313:     i("req_and_rep -> start the MGC"),    
  314:     ET = [{Codec, EC, tcp}, {Codec, EC, udp}],
  315:     Mgc = start(fun() -> mgc_start(MgcNode, ET) end, mgc_start_timeout),
  316: 
  317:     i("req_and_rep -> start and connect the MGs"),    
  318:     MgConf0 = [{Mg1Node, "mg1", Codec, EC, tcp, ?MG_VERBOSITY},
  319: 	       {Mg2Node, "mg2", Codec, EC, udp, ?MG_VERBOSITY}],
  320:     MgConf = connect_mg(MgConf0, []),
  321: 
  322:     %% Collect the (initial) MGs statistics
  323:     Stats1 = get_mg_stats(MgConf, []),
  324:     d("req_and_rep -> stats for the MGs: ~n~p", [Stats1]),
  325: 
  326:     %% Collect and check the MGC statistics
  327:     i("req_and_rep -> collect and check the MGC stats"),    
  328:     {ok, MgcStats1} = ?MGC_GET_STATS(Mgc, 1),
  329:     d("req_and_rep  -> stats (1) for Mgc: ~n~p~n", [MgcStats1]),
  330: 
  331: 
  332:     sleep(1000),
  333: 
  334: 
  335:     %% And apply some load 
  336:     i("req_and_rep -> apply traffic load"),
  337:     ok = apply_load(MgConf),
  338: 
  339:     %% Await completion of load part and the collect traffic
  340:     i("req_and_rep -> await load completion"),
  341:     ok = await_load_complete(MgConf),
  342: 
  343: 
  344:     sleep(1000),
  345: 
  346: 
  347:     i("req_and_rep -> collect the MGs statistics"),
  348:     Stats2 = get_mg_stats(MgConf, []),
  349:     d("req_and_rep -> stats for MGs: ~n~p", [Stats2]),
  350: 
  351:     i("req_and_rep -> collect the MGC statistics"),
  352:     {ok, MgcStats2} = ?MGC_GET_STATS(Mgc, 1),
  353:     d("req_and_rep  -> stats (1) for Mgc: ~n~p~n", [MgcStats2]),
  354: 
  355: 
  356:     sleep(1000),
  357: 
  358: 
  359:     %% Reset counters
  360:     i("req_and_rep -> reset the MGs statistics"),
  361:     reset_mg_stats(MgConf),
  362:     Stats3 = get_mg_stats(MgConf, []),
  363:     d("req_and_rep -> stats for the MGs: ~n~p", [Stats3]),
  364: 
  365:     i("req_and_rep -> reset the MGC statistics"),
  366:     reset_mgc_stats(Mgc),
  367:     {ok, MgcStats3} = ?MGC_GET_STATS(Mgc, 1),
  368:     d("req_and_rep  -> stats (1) for Mgc: ~n~p~n", [MgcStats3]),
  369: 
  370: 
  371:     sleep(1000),
  372: 
  373: 
  374:     %% Tell MGs to stop
  375:     i("req_and_rep -> stop the MGs"),
  376:     stop_mg(MgConf),
  377: 
  378: 
  379:     sleep(1000),
  380: 
  381: 
  382:     %% Collect the statistics
  383:     i("req_and_rep -> collect the MGC statistics"),
  384:     {ok, MgcStats4} = ?MGC_GET_STATS(Mgc, 1),
  385:     d("req_and_rep -> stats (1) for Mgc: ~n~p~n", [MgcStats4]),
  386:     {ok, MgcStats5} = ?MGC_GET_STATS(Mgc, 2),
  387:     d("req_and_rep -> stats (2) for Mgc: ~n~p~n", [MgcStats5]),
  388: 
  389:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
  390:     i("req_and_rep -> stop the MGC"),
  391:     mgc_stop(Mgc),
  392: 
  393:     i("req_and_rep -> done", []),
  394:     ok.
  395: 
  396: 
  397: connect_mg([], Acc) ->
  398:     lists:reverse(Acc);
  399: connect_mg([{Node, Name, Codec, EC, Trans, Verb}|Mg], Acc) ->
  400:     Pid = connect_mg(Node, Name, Codec, EC, Trans, Verb),
  401:     connect_mg(Mg, [{Name, Pid}|Acc]).
  402: 
  403: connect_mg(Node, Name, Codec, EC, Trans, Verb) ->
  404:     Mid = {deviceName, Name}, 
  405:     Pid = start(fun() -> ?MG_START(Node, Mid, Codec, EC, Trans, Verb) end,
  406:                 mg_start_timeout),
  407: 
  408:     {ok, _} = ?MG_EAR(Pid, true),
  409: 
  410:     %% Ask the MGs to do a service change
  411:     Res = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Pid),
  412:     d("connect_mg -> (~s) service change result: ~p", [Name,Res]),
  413: 
  414:     Pid.
  415: 
  416: 
  417: stop_mg(MGs) ->
  418:     [?MG_STOP(Pid) || {_Name, Pid} <- MGs].
  419: 
  420: 
  421: get_mg_stats([], Acc) ->
  422:     lists:reverse(Acc);
  423: get_mg_stats([{Name, Pid}|Mgs], Acc) ->
  424:     {ok, Stats} = ?MG_GET_STATS(Pid),
  425:     d("get_mg_stats -> stats for ~s: ~n~p~n", [Name, Stats]),
  426:     get_mg_stats(Mgs, [{Name, Stats}|Acc]).
  427: 
  428: 
  429: apply_load([]) ->
  430:     ok;
  431: apply_load([{_, MG}|MGs]) ->
  432:     d("apply_load -> apply load to ~p", [MG]),
  433:     ?MG_APPLY_LOAD(MG,?LOAD_COUNTER_START),
  434:     apply_load(MGs).
  435: 
  436: 
  437: reset_mg_stats([]) ->
  438:     ok;
  439: reset_mg_stats([{Name, Pid}|MGs]) ->
  440:     d("reset_mg_stats -> resetting ~s", [Name]),
  441:     ?MG_RESET_STATS(Pid),
  442:     reset_mg_stats(MGs).
  443: 
  444: reset_mgc_stats(Mgc) ->
  445:     d("reset_mgc_stats -> resetting ~p", [Mgc]),
  446:     ?MGC_RESET_STATS(Mgc).
  447: 
  448:     
  449: await_load_complete([]) ->
  450:     ok;
  451: await_load_complete(MGs0) ->
  452:     receive
  453: 	{load_complete, Pid} ->
  454: 	    d("received load_complete from ~p", [Pid]),
  455: 	    MGs1 = lists:keydelete(Pid, 2, MGs0),
  456: 	    await_load_complete(lists:delete(Pid, MGs1));
  457: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
  458: 	    i("exit signal from ~p: ~p", [Pid, Reason]),
  459: 	    case lists:keymember(Pid, 2, MGs0) of
  460: 		true ->
  461: 		    exit({mg_exit, Pid, Reason});
  462: 		false ->
  463: 		    MGs1 = lists:keydelete(Pid, 2, MGs0),
  464: 		    await_load_complete(lists:delete(Pid, MGs1))
  465: 	    end;
  466: 	Other ->
  467: 	    d("received unexpected message: ~n~p", [Other]),
  468: 	    await_load_complete(MGs0)
  469:     end.
  470: 	    
  471: 
  472: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  473: 
  474: %% Start the 'unit' (MGC or MG).
  475: %% If it fails for reason = timeout, we issue an skip.
  476: start(Exec, Reason) ->
  477:     case Exec() of
  478:         {ok, Pid} ->
  479:             Pid;
  480:         {error, timeout} ->
  481:             ?SKIP(Reason)
  482:     end.
  483: 
  484: 
  485: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  486: 
  487: make_node_name(Name) ->
  488:     case string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()), [$@]) of
  489: 	[_,Host] ->
  490: 	    list_to_atom(lists:concat([atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@" ++ Host]));
  491: 	_ ->
  492: 	    exit("Test node must be started with '-sname'")
  493:      end.
  494: 
  495: 
  496: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  497: 
  498: sleep(X) ->
  499:     receive after X -> ok end.
  500: 
  501: 
  502: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  503: 
  504: try_tc(TCName, Pre, Case, Post) ->
  505:     try_tc(TCName, "TEST", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Pre, Case, Post).
  506: 
  507: try_tc(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post) ->
  508:     ?TRY_TC(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post).
  509: 
  510: 
  511: 
  512: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  513: 
  514: i(F) ->
  515:     i(F, []).
  516: 
  517: i(F, A) ->
  518:     print(info, get(verbosity), "", F, A).
  519: 
  520: 
  521: d(F) ->
  522:     d(F, []).
  523: 
  524: d(F, A) ->
  525:     print(debug, get(verbosity), "DBG: ", F, A).
  526: 
  527: 
  528: printable(_, debug)   -> true;
  529: printable(info, info) -> true;
  530: printable(_,_)        -> false.
  531: 
  532: print(Severity, Verbosity, P, F, A) ->
  533:     print(printable(Severity,Verbosity), P, F, A).
  534: 
  535: print(true, P, F, A) ->
  536:     io:format("*** [~s] ~s ~p ~s ***"
  537: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
  538: 	      [?FTS(), P, self(), get(sname) | A]);
  539: print(_, _, _, _) ->
  540:     ok.
  541: 
  542: 
  543: p(F, A) ->
  544:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p ***"
  545: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
  546: 	      [?FTS(), self() | A]).
